text: @RandPaul @NYGovCuomo New York had to contend with the greatest population density, which made fighting COVID-19 much harder there than anywhere else in the U.S. In spite of this handicap, Cuomo has done far better than DeSantis in Florida! Shame on you for not admitting this!
